meanings.definition: A type of flour made from durum wheat.
meanings.sent1: I used semolinas to make pasta dough.
meanings.sent2: The bakery ordered a large bag of semolinas for their bread recipes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous chef accidentally spilled semolinas all over the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: The semolinas sprinkled on the dough like fairy dust, transforming it into a delicious loaf.
meanings.sent5: The golden semolinas shimmered under the sunlight, tempting everyone with its aroma.

meanings.sent1: The recipe called for two cups of semolinas.
meanings.sent2: The store had run out of semolinas, so I had to use regular flour instead.
meanings.sent3: The kids at the party had a semolinas fight, creating a mess in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The semolinas piled up in the bowl like tiny mountains waiting to be turned into a delicious dish.
meanings.sent5: The bag of semolinas on the shelf stood out with its bright packaging, attracting customers.
